name: Wondrous Potion Vial
loreDescription: A potion of love, or a potion of eternal youth. Only one of each exists in this world. Which do you choose?
- A Senior Fellow of the Alchemy Society, Pei

skillDescription.base: 50.0% chance to dispel one debuff from an ally at the beginning of the turn.
skillDescription.max: 100.0% chance to dispel one debuff from an ally at the beginning of the turn.
